Name: Totally Convenient
About the game: EXPERIENCE THE MOST INCONVENIENT WAY TO SERVE CUSTOMERS Feed the customers of a restaurant using a set of weird machines attached to a conveyor belt! MASTER MULTI-TASKING EYE-HAND COORDINATION React at the right time to feed the customers while keeping an eye on the timer, the orders, the clients and the dishes! ENDURE SHORT SESSIONS OF FAST PACED GAMEPLAY Complete each of the 70 level's objective in 45 seconds. The conveyor belt who brings the food won't slow down, so your brain has to speed up! DISCOVER MECHANICS THAT BRINGS NEW BRAIN-MELTING CHALLENGES Learn to use ingenious machines that might reveal themselves as more difficult than you expected at first sight! FOCUS TO SURVIVE AN OVERWHELMINGLY TENSE LEVELS Stress test your nerves, your logic and your reflexes in many different ways. Strap in because it's going to be a bumpy ride! /
